name: Broad City High Score
description:
Rip through a series of hilarious Broad City and weed themed mini-games to get HIGHER... scores, social status, and amounts of lolz in Broad City: High Score!

Share your Broad City High Score with your buds, challenge them to get higher. We're not blowing smoke, and we can't be more blunt, yas, Broad City: High Score rules the worldwide bloodstream!

420 Reasons you should play Broad City High Score:

1. Dope art and sounds
2. NYC
3. Marijuana themed mini-games
4. Abbi
5. Ilana
6. Weed
7. Jaime
8. Bingo Bronson
9. Pot
10. Broad City
...
416. Bongs
417. More weed

419. More Abbi
420. And Lincoln!
